attributes.action: Block any payments to the EU after "No Deal Brexit"
attributes.additional_details: When we final leave the EU, no divorce bill is to be paid. Counter sue for return of UK owned EU resources; return of UK funds wasted by the EU and compensation for damage demanded to UK industries by EU legislation. NO PAYMENTS, INCLUDING THE "DIVORCE BILL" ARE TO BE PAID. Make this law. The EU has taken from us for long enough.
attributes.background: The EU has received funds from the UK for long enough. They forced us to sign up to their projects and to pay into them at a disproportionate level. This must stop!
